body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Frankfort, August 16th 1864.
SPECIAL ORDERS,
NO. 56.

The resignation of the following named officer is accepted to take effect from the 28th day of July 1864.
Capt J. C Bussey
1s Ky Scouts.
With the condition that he shall recieve no final payment until he has satisfied the Pay Department that he is not indebted to the state of Ky.

By command of the Governor:
D W Lindsey
Inspector & Adjutant General of Kentucky.

Adjutant. Genls office
Frankfort Aug. 16 -- 1864
Special Or No 56.
Accepting the resignation of Capt. J. C. Bussy of the 1st Ky. Scouts
